Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After who knows how long, Arnold is just about to finish maintenance on Wanshi. With no room for error, sweat drips down his cheeks.'}
{3: 'Right at this moment, the sphere bot jumps up and projects a holo-map of the city for both of them to see.'}
{3: 'The holo-map shows three blips running among the collapsed buildings. Bright sparks flash intermittently.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Are those your comrades?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: '...Yup. Guess those two idiots came looking for me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Because they're your comrades...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Comrades...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Alright, just gotta patch up one more thing.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Arnold places the sphere bot in Wanshi's hand."}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Bahaha! Not like you can refuse, can you? Let's finish patchin' you up.", 4: '2'}

{3: "Arnold walks back a few steps and sits on the sofa. He takes a pill out from a pillbox under the sofa and swallows. Wanshi cannot tell what it is, but based on Arnold's look of disgust, it must be a tough pill to swallow."}
{3: "The sphere bot standing before Wanshi slowly opens up as a series of connectors extend out from within and connect with Wanshi's external ports."}
{3: "Wanshi can feel the robot's energy pour into his body. With Arnold having fixed his external damages, his lack of operating power is restored with the help of the robot."}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Since I\'ve had talked with another "person."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'But this power is...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Think of it as a gift for showin' me the outside world. I don't like owin' others nothin'.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I don't want that power goin' to waste. It's broken beyond repair anyways. Why not give it all to you...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Not to mention, we'll have a better chance of both of us gettin' outta this mess.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Alright, now it's my turn. Let's see what organ is damaged.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi stretches his hands and feet. With his limps functioning normally, he gets up and approaches Arnold. However, Arnold reaches out his hand and gestures for him to stop.'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "There's more important **** to do than look after me. You saw the holo-map. Your comrades are in trouble.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Let's go. Show me what kinda world we live in now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I have been hidin' for too long, but I feel like goin' out there today.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Sigh... Alright.', 4: '1'}
